name: 2NÂ® Mobile Video
description: The 2N Mobile Video is an application that allows you to receive video calls from the 2N intercom on your smartphone over the Internet and thus keep up with your visitors anywhere you go. There is no need to be within the reach of your local Wi-Fi. Is somebody ringing your door intercom? Just pull out your phone and check the feed from the intercoms camera. Uncover what is happening at your front door and decide whether to let your visitor in. Or if you feel like chitchatting, enter a video call with your visitor. Possible opening of the door is then only a matter of single button press.  Did you know the 2N intercom can be integrated with your home automation system? It gives 2N Mobile Video application a whole new dimension. It then lets you control lights, trigger alarm or start any other custom action. Are you wondering how to get such an amazing service? Go to https://my2n.com/#/mobilevideo and start your free trial of 2N Mobile Video.
